    Quick Start

    Get started with LooK in under 5 minutes.

    1. Enter Your URL

    Paste any website URL into the input field. LooK works with any public website.

    2. Generate Demo

    Click Generate Demo and our AI will:

    • Analyze your website's layout and content
    • Generate a professional voiceover script
    • Record an automated walkthrough with smart zoom
    • Track cursor movements for natural-looking demos

    3. Edit & Export

    Fine-tune the script, adjust zoom points, add markers, then export to your preferred platform.

    üí° Pro Tip: Use Live Record mode for full control over the recording process.

    AI Analysis

    LooK uses GPT-4 Vision to understand your website.

    What We Analyze

    • Layout Structure - Headers, sections, CTAs
    • Brand Colors - Automatic theme detection
    • Key Features - Product highlights and benefits
    • Interactive Elements - Buttons, forms, navigation

    Script Generation

    Based on the analysis, we generate a professional voiceover script that:

    • Highlights key selling points
    • Maintains a natural speaking rhythm
    • Fits your specified duration
